ing: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed
1 (14.5 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
2 (10 ounce) cans RED GOLDÂ® Petite Diced Tomatoes & Green Chilies
1 (14.5 ounce) can RED GOLDÂ® Diced Tomatoes, drained
Salt and black pepper to taste
n: Black Bean and Corn Salsa from RED GOLDÂ®
des: "Fresh summer flavors any time of the year! Our tomatoes combined with corn and black beans, green onions and cilantro make the best dip. All you need is a sturdy chip!"
ins: In a large bowl combine all ingredients, stir to combine. Refrigerate for several hours or overnight to blend the flavors. Serve with chips or crackers.
